sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Container, Link, Grid, Card, CardContent } from '@mui/material'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; const Contact: React.FC = () => { const fadeInVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 20 }, visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0 } }; return ( Contact Me Feel free to reach out to me via email at rizkynugraha999@gmail.com or connect with me on social media: LinkedIn GitHub Facebook ); }; export default Contact;
